description: A giant continent country with various climates and unique ecosystems both onland and inocean. Famous for it's beaches and surfing, it is also a great gettaway destination
A country known for it's cuisine, history and culture. With beaches, to mountains and castles, if you dare to venture off the beaten path there you can stumble uppon many hidden gems

This country is a 4000km long coast and mountain range from South to North, and only as wide as 200km. This two dimensional country spans all the climates and landscapes you can imagine. You are sure to find something for you here
Rich in culture and famous for it's incredible food. This spicy country is filled with diverse nature and spiritualism
